amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-464 to add Section 702 to the exclusive means by which the government obtains the location information of U.S. persons or persons inside the United States, web browsing history, Internet search history, or any other data that would require a court order.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
